title: if you're gonna play ap carry
body:
its a good idea to build RoA first, its the best item to rush by a long shot, it gives 120 flat ap after 10 minutes and a lot of tankyness and spammablitiy with mana+ sustain with passive, if ur playing fizz u don't have to rush lich bane anymore, remember its not season 3 and lichbane is a third item minimum now due to proc damage nerfs u need ap first.

thx.
